name: moltbot-heroku
description: Heroku worker wrapper for Moltbot (formerly Clawdbot) using Telegram long polling.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key used by the OpenAI provider.

LOG_LEVEL.description: Logging level passed to Moltbot (info, debug, warn, error).

GROUP_REQUIRE_MENTION.description: Require @mention in groups before Moltbot responds.

MOLT_CONFIG_PATH.description: Path to generated Moltbot config JSON.

ALLOWED_USER_IDS.description: Optional comma-separated Telegram user IDs allowed to pair or DM.

ALLOWED_GROUP_IDS.description: Optional comma-separated Telegram group chat IDs allowed to use the bot.

WORKSPACE_PATH.description: Workspace directory (must be under /tmp for Heroku).

DISABLE_DANGEROUS_TOOLS.description: Disable dangerous tools and skills by default.
